thread.title: ATP World Tour 250, Budapest Men's Singles Results

title: ATP World Tour 250, Budapest Men's Singles Results

organizations.name: budapest men's singles results   results reuters

text: April 25, 2018 / 1:20 AM / Updated 22 minutes ago ATP World Tour 250, Budapest Men's Singles Results Reuters Staff 1 Min Read Apr 25 (OPTA) - Results from the ATP World Tour 250, Budapest Men's Singles matches on Tuesday .. 1st Round .. Maximilian Marterer (GER) beat Viktor Troicki (SRB) 3-6 6-4 6-4 Yannick Maden (GER) beat 6-Marton Fucsovics (HUN) 4-6 6-3 6-2 Matteo Berrettini (ITA) beat Attila Balazs (HUN) 6-4 3-6 7-6(4) 8-Andreas Seppi (ITA) beat Thomas Fabbiano (ITA) 4-6 7-5 6-3 Nikoloz Basilashvili (GEO) beat Paolo Lorenzi (ITA) 6-4 6-2 7-Jan-Lennard Struff (GER) beat Jurgen Zopp (EST) 2-6 6-4 7-5 Alexander Bublik (RUS) beat Denis Istomin (UZB) 6-7(6) 7-6(5) 7-5
